responsive_rules: Mobile-first; content in a centered container on desktop.
Tables scroll horizontally on small screens (overflow-x-auto).

typography.font_family: ui-sans-serif, system-ui, -apple-system, Segoe UI, Roboto, Inter, Helvetica Neue, Arial, Noto Sans, Apple Color Emoji, Segoe UI Emoji

topnav.base: flex items-center justify-between h-14 px-3 sm:px-4 border-b
topnav.brand: flex items-center gap-2 text-lg sm:text-xl font-semibold
topnav.burger: inline-flex items-center justify-center w-10 h-10 rounded-lg border focus:outline-none focus:shadow-[var(--focus)] sm:hidden

sidebar.wrapper: hidden sm:flex flex-col h-screen sticky top-0 border-r
sidebar.section_label: px-3 pt-4 pb-2 text-xs uppercase tracking-wide text-slate-500 dark:text-neutral-400
sidebar.item_base: flex items-center gap-3 px-3 py-2 rounded-xl cursor-pointer transition-colors
sidebar.label: truncate
sidebar.collapse_toggle: absolute -right-3 top-16 z-10 w-6 h-6 rounded-full border bg-white dark:bg-neutral-900 flex items-center justify-center
sidebar.tooltip: absolute left-full ml-2 px-2 py-1 text-xs rounded-md border bg-white dark:bg-neutral-900 dark:text-neutral-100 shadow-lg

mobile_drawer.panel: fixed inset-y-0 left-0 w-72 p-3 bg-white dark:bg-neutral-950 border-r sm:hidden

tabs.trigger: px-3 py-1.5 border rounded-xl data-[active=true]:bg-slate-100 dark:data-[active=true]:bg-neutral-800/70

button.base: inline-flex items-center justify-center px-3 py-2 font-medium rounded-xl border transition focus:outline-none
button.secondary: bg-white dark:bg-neutral-900 border-slate-200 dark:border-neutral-800 hover:bg-slate-50 dark:hover:bg-neutral-800

input.base: w-full px-3 py-2 border rounded-lg bg-white dark:bg-neutral-900 placeholder:text-neutral-500 focus:outline-none

badge.base: inline-flex items-center px-2 py-0.5 text-xs font-medium rounded-full border
badge.neutral: bg-slate-100 text-slate-700 border-slate-200 dark:bg-neutral-800 dark:text-neutral-200 dark:border-neutral-700
badge.success: bg-emerald-50 text-emerald-700 border-emerald-200 dark:bg-emerald-900/20 dark:text-emerald-300 dark:border-emerald-900/30
badge.warning: bg-amber-50 text-amber-700 border-amber-200 dark:bg-amber-900/20 dark:text-amber-300 dark:border-amber-900/30
badge.danger: bg-rose-50 text-rose-700 border-rose-200 dark:bg-rose-900/20 dark:text-rose-300 dark:border-rose-900/30

timer.card: rounded-2xl border p-6 flex flex-col items-center justify-center text-center

modal.content: fixed inset-x-0 top-20 mx-auto w-[min(600px,92%)] rounded-2xl border p-4 bg-white dark:bg-neutral-900

toast.base: fixed bottom-4 right-4 px-4 py-2 rounded-xl border bg-white dark:bg-neutral-900

rules: Do not hardcode colors or fonts in components; use tokens from this profile.
TopBanner must render identically on all modules.
Sidebar collapses to icons-only on desktop; on mobile it becomes a hamburger-driven drawer.
When sidebar is collapsed, show tooltips on hover/focus for items.
Icons come from the configured icon set; do not inline SVGs unless necessary.
Use zebra rows and sticky header for all data tables.
Buttons and inputs must use the shared radius/shadow/focus tokens.
Keep surfaces neutral (slate). Reserve emerald/teal for interactive accents (buttons, focus, badges).
acceptance: Desktop layout uses a collapsible left sidebar (264px expanded / 72px collapsed).
Mobile shows a hamburger in TopNav that opens the same menu as the sidebar.
Both To-Dos and Time Tracking use the same container, card, button, and typography tokens.
To-Dos table renders with borders, zebra rows, sticky header, and hover state.
Dark mode is the default visual base with neutral surfaces; accents use emerald/teal.
Light mode styles exist (even if toggle is not yet exposed).
